availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Greenberry Walker Higgins (Marshall co. watchmaker / lyon co. silversmith )

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, watchmaker. Georgia native. Son of John Higgins and Sophia Higgins. Married to Euphemia Howerton Higgins in Marshall County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1857. Father of Solon Higgins and Capitola Higgins. Resident in Chambers County, Alabama, in 1850. Watchmaker in Marshall County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Alabama, Chambers County, District 19.5, p. 397B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton, p. 748.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 43B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marshall County Marriages, Film #, p. 325 of 1497 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
